review: I've constantly have been troubled with the fact that the child labor for my ice cream factory has been slowing down production, what with all the time consuming slicing of bananas with the plastic spoons the government in my country regulates us to use for their tiny little fingers.But thanks to this model of the banana slicer we no longer have to worry about finding their chopped fingers in our banana splits. And since this comes in a pack of two, they can be more efficient with both their hands and slice twice the ammount of bananas. My business has never been better.
